130#pragma region Alignment utility macros
131// alignment macros
132#if defined(_MSC_VER)
133#define NCPP_ALIGNAS(N) __declspec(align(N))
134#elif defined( __GNUC__ ) || defined(__MINGW64__)
135#define NCPP_ALIGNAS(N) __attribute__((__align(N)))
136#endif
137
138#define NCPP_DEFAULT_ALIGNAS NCPP_ALIGNAS(NCPP_DEFAULT_ALIGN)
139#pragma endregion
140
144
145#pragma region Implements warning macros
146// Implements static warning
147#if defined(__GNUC__)
148#define DEPRECATE(foo, msg) foo __attribute__((deprecated(msg)))
149#elif defined(_MSC_VER)
150#define DEPRECATE(foo, msg) __declspec(deprecated(msg)) foo
151#else
152#error This compiler is not supported
153#endif
154
155#define NCPP_PP_CAT(x,y) NCPP_PP_CAT1(x,y)
156#define NCPP_PP_CAT1(x,y) x##y
157
158namespace ncpp {
159
160 namespace static_warning_helper
161 {
162 struct true_type {};
163 struct false_type {};
164 template <int test> struct converter : public true_type {};
165 template <> struct converter<0> : public false_type {};
166 }
167
168}
169
170#define static_warning(cond, msg) \
171struct NCPP_PP_CAT(static_warning,__LINE__) { \
172 DEPRECATE(void _(::ncpp::static_warning_helper::false_type const& ),msg) {}; \
173 void _(::ncpp::static_warning_helper::true_type const& ) {}; \
174 NCPP_PP_CAT(static_warning,__LINE__)() {_(ncpp::static_warning_helper::converter<(cond)>());} \
175}
176
177// Note: using static_warning_template changes the meaning of a program in a small way.
178// It introduces a member/variable declaration. This means at least one byte of space
179// in each structure/class instantiation. static_warning should be preferred in any
180// non-template situation.
181// 'token' must be a program-wide unique identifier.
182#define static_warning_template(token, cond, msg) \
183 static_warning(cond, msg) NCPP_PP_CAT(NCPP_PP_CAT(_localvar_, token),__LINE__)
184
188
189#ifndef NDEBUG
190#define NCPP_DEBUG
191#define warning(cond, msg) if(!(cond)) std::cout << "Warning: " << msg << std::endl;
192#else
193#define warning(cond, msg) ;
194#endif

208#pragma region Primitive type limits
209
210#define NCPP_U64_MAX 0xFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFF
211#define NCPP_U64_MIN 0
212#define NCPP_U32_MAX 0xFFFFFFFF
213#define NCPP_U32_MIN 0
214#define NCPP_U16_MAX 0xFFFF
215#define NCPP_U16_MIN 0
216#define NCPP_U8_MAX 0xFF
217#define NCPP_U8_MIN 0
218
219#define NCPP_I64_MAX 0x7FFFFFFFFFFFFFFF
220#define NCPP_I64_MIN -0x8000000000000000
221#define NCPP_I32_MAX 0x7FFFFFFF
222#define NCPP_I32_MIN -0x80000000
223#define NCPP_I16_MAX 0x7FFF
224#define NCPP_I16_MIN -0x8000
225#define NCPP_I8_MAX 0x7F
226#define NCPP_I8_MIN -0x80
